lines.text:
[camera zooms in on definition]
sa-botage sà-bo-tarj. Wilful destruction of buildings or machinery with the object of alarming a group of persons or inspiring public uneasiness.
What's at the back of it?

[trying to calm crowd down demanding their money back after a power outage]
It's an act of God, I tell you!
And what do you call an act of God?
I call your face one, and you won't get your money back on that.
